translation.en: Witcher.
[Triss] You say this is all life is to you.
Monsters and money.
I feel something out there waits for you.
translation.ja: あなたには待っているわ

translation.en: Something more.
How much for this beast?
[man] Four marks.
Let me out!
Magic is organizing Chaos.
translation.ja: 魔法とは混沌(カオス)を操ることです

translation.en: Without control…
Your hand!
[Tissaia] …Chaos will kill you.
[Tissaia] Demonstrated beautifully. Thank you, Fringilla.
translation.ja: いい見本だったわ フリンギラ

translation.en: There are mages who ignore their emotions…
translation.ja: 感情に左右されない者と―

translation.en: -[yells] -…and then there are mages who are consumed by them.
translation.ja: 感情に 駆られる魔法使いがいる

translation.en: It is your job to control Chaos, -not become it. -[screams]
translation.ja: 混沌になるのではなく 制御なさい

translation.en: -What's your name? -Istredd.
translation.ja: あなたは？ イストレド

translation.en: You can trust me.
What do you want?
I want to be powerful.
[Giltine] There is a cost to all creation.
translation.ja: 創り出すには対価が伴う

translation.en: To be reborn,
you will bear no more.
I know who you are.
You're a monster hunter.
White hair, big old loner…
-We don't want your kind here, Witcher. -You mutant son of a bitch.
translation.ja: ウィッチャーは去れ クソ変異体(ミュータント)め

translation.en: You're the witcher, Geralt of Rivia.
translation.ja: リヴィアのゲラルトだろ

translation.en: A job, I've got for you.
-[Geralt] Evil is evil. -[blade swooshes]
Lesser, greater, middling,
translation.ja: 小さくても大きくても 並みでも

translation.en: it's all the same.
What if they come after you?
Why not kill them?
Because then, I am what they say I am.
translation.ja: 殺せば俺は本当に怪物になる

translation.en: [Jaskier] The Butcher of Blaviken!
The girl in the woods is your destiny.
translation.ja: 森の少女があなたの運命よ

translation.en: [Jaskier] You have got a bit of an image problem.
translation.ja: 君は評判に問題がある

translation.en: [Geralt] Go away.
[Jaskier] I won't be but silent backup.
translation.ja: 静かに援護するからさ

translation.en: Oh my God.
[Istredd] Elves are the original sorcerers of the Continent.
translation.ja: エルフが原始の魔法使いで…

translation.en: Mages taught the first humans how to turn Chaos into magic.
My elders were slaughtered.
I was once Filavandrel of the Silver Towers.
translation.ja: 私は銀の塔に住む王だった

translation.en: Show the humans that you are more than what they fear you to be.
translation.ja: 人間が思うより 恐ろしい存在だと見せつけろ

translation.en: [Geralt] This is where we part ways, Bard.
[Jaskier] I promised to change the public's tune about you.
-At least allow me to try. -[strums lute]
♪ Toss a coin to your witcher ♪
translation.ja: ウィッチャーに金貨を！

translation.en: ♪ O, Valley of Plenty ♪
[crowd joins in] ♪ Toss a coin to your witcher ♪
translation.ja: ウィッチャーに金貨を投げろ

translation.en: ♪ A friend of humanity ♪ Ah, thank you!
translation.ja: ウィッチャーは人類の友

translation.en: I've made you famous, Witcher.
All I'm asking for is one night bodyguarding your best friend in the whole world.
translation.ja: 見返りに ひと晩 親友を警護してくれ

translation.en: I'm not your friend.
[page] All rise for Her Majesty, Queen Calanthe of Cintra!
translation.ja: シントラのキャランセ女王の おなりだ

translation.en: Can't have anyone finding out who you are.
-Geralt of Rivia, the mighty witcher! -[Jaskier] Oh, shit.
translation.ja: リヴィアのゲラルト 最強のウィッチャー！ クソ

translation.en: [Calanthe] Come, Witcher. Take a seat by my side.
[Mousesack] These suitors will vie all night for Princess Pavetta's hand.
translation.ja: 求婚者らは姫を巡って 夜通し張り合う

translation.en: I've come to claim your daughter's hand in marriage.
translation.ja: パヴェッタ姫に求婚する

translation.en: [Duny] I come to claim Pavetta, by the Law of Surprise.
translation.ja: “驚きの法”に基づき 姫をもらう

translation.en: I saved your husband, King Roegner, from a certain death.
translation.ja: あなたの夫 ログネル王を 死から救い―

translation.en: I chose the Law of Surprise as payment.
translation.ja: 見返りに驚きの法を求めた

translation.en: Slay this beast!
[Eist] The Law of Surprise is as old as mankind itself.
translation.ja: 驚きの法は 人類の始めからある

translation.en: [Mousesack] When one has saved another from certain death…
translation.ja: 誰かを死から救った時…

translation.en: -No! -[roars]
…the Law of Surprise can be claimed to pay that debt.
translation.ja: 報酬として驚きの法を 要求できる

translation.en: [Eist] Destiny determines the surprise.
[Mousesack] Your blessing of this marriage has fulfilled a destiny.
translation.ja: 結婚により運命は全うされた

translation.en: You saved my life. I must repay you.
translation.ja: 命を救われた礼をしたい

translation.en: I claim the tradition as you have. The Law of Surprise.
translation.ja: なら 驚きの法で返してくれ

translation.en: What have you done, Witcher?
Destiny can go f--
Fuck.
You're bound to this child whether you like it or not.
translation.ja: 不本意だろうと運命の子だ

translation.en: I'm getting out of here. Alone.
translation.ja: 俺は独りで ここから帰る

translation.en: Hello. What's it been, years?
translation.ja: 久しぶりだな 何を釣ろうとしてる？

translation.en: -What are you fishing for, exactly? -A djinn. I can't sleep.
translation.ja: 久しぶりだな 何を釣ろうとしてる？ ジンだ　眠れない

translation.en: Just maybe this has got something to do with the Law of Surprise, destiny. Being unable to escape the child that belongs to you.
translation.ja: 眠れないのは運命の子から 逃げられないのが怖いから？

translation.en: [Geralt] No!
-Jaskier? -[coughs]
[Chireadan] But he needs a magical remedy.
-[Geralt] You must be the mage. -[Yennefer] Yennefer of Vengerberg.
translation.ja: 魔法使いだな？ イェネファーよ

translation.en: [Geralt] He was attacked by a djinn.
translation.ja: ジンの仕業だ　治してくれ

translation.en: -Fix it. -[Yennefer] A djinn?
translation.ja: ジンの仕業だ　治してくれ ジン？

translation.en: -Do you doubt my capabilities? -No. Just your intentions.
translation.ja: 私の能力を疑う？ いや 意図を疑ってる

translation.en: She wants to be the vessel.
-Dont! -You seem to want to meet your end.
translation.ja: やめろ 死にたいようね

translation.en: As do you.
[voices overlapping] Make your wish.
You can have anything you want.
I wish…
[Jaskier] Oh, they're alive.
They're really alive!
[Geralt] The moment I dread most is when it fades.
translation.ja: 君の香りが消える瞬間が 怖かった

translation.en: When you're really gone.
[Yennefer] You left first.
I woke up in that destroyed house, and you were gone.
translation.ja: 壊れた家で 目覚めたら独りだった

translation.en: A short while ago, a green dragon landed across the border in King Niedamir's mountains.
translation.ja: 少し前に緑竜が ニーダミル王の領土を侵した

translation.en: He's commissioned a hunt to kill it.
[Jaskier] We really can't get involved.
-I'm in. -Mother of…
[Yennefer] I've walked this earth for decades without coming across a witcher,
translation.ja: 何十年もウィッチャーに 会わなかったのに

translation.en: and then the first one I meet, I can't get rid of.
translation.ja: 一度会うと何度も会う

translation.en: -What are you doing here, Yen? -I'm here for the dragon.
Do not tell me you've traveled all this way for made-up fertility cures using fresh dragon hearts.
translation.ja: 竜の心臓が受胎薬だという デマを信じてるのか？

translation.en: -They're not made-up. -They are.
-What could you want with a child? -[Yennefer] They took my choice.
translation.ja: なぜ 子を望む？ 奪われた選択肢を 取り戻すだけ

translation.en: -I want it back. -[screaming]
translation.ja: 奪われた選択肢を 取り戻すだけ

translation.en: [Geralt] The dwarves, they're leading us to a shorter path.
translation.ja: ドワーフたちが 近道を案内してくれる

translation.en: Nilfgaard has returned burning through the south.
translation.ja: ニルフガードが侵攻してる

translation.en: [Yennefer] With Fringilla as their mage.
[Fringilla] Cahir, we must move.
translation.ja: カヒル 進みましょう

translation.en: They're inching closer by the day.
translation.ja: 日々 領土を広げてる

translation.en: Won't be long till they try and take Cintra.
[Geralt] Come with me.
[Yennefer] I can take care of myself.
[Geralt] You don't always have to.
[Yennefer] I was afraid that mountain would take you from me.
translation.ja: あなたを失うかと思った

translation.en: -I'm not leaving till I kill that dragon. -Yen…
translation.ja: 必ず竜は殺す 何の解決になる？

translation.en: -What will it solve? -[Yennefer] Everything.
translation.ja: 何の解決になる？ 何もかもよ

translation.en: She was protecting her baby.
Now!
[Geralt] Did you always want to become a mother?
I dreamed of becoming important to someone.
translation.ja: 私の夢は… 誰かの大切な人になること

translation.en: [Geralt] You're important to me.
-The djinn. -That's why we can't escape each other.
translation.ja: ジンだ そのせいで惹(ひ)かれ合ってる？

translation.en: You made a wish.
-It's magic. -[Geralt] It's real, Yen.
[Yennefer] How could we ever know?
I made that wish to save your life.
translation.ja: 君を救うことを願った

translation.en: I didn't need your help!
A child is no way to boost your fragile ego, Yen.
translation.ja: エゴのために子を欲しがるな

translation.en: I'll take advice from you about children as soon as you take responsibility for the one you bound to you and then abandoned!
translation.ja: 余計なお世話よ 驚きの子を見捨てたくせに！

translation.en: [Borch] The sorceress will never regain her womb.
translation.ja: 彼女の子宮は戻らない

translation.en: And though you didn't want to lose her, Geralt, you will.
translation.ja: ゲラルトは どうあっても 彼女を失う

translation.en: He already has.
[Geralt] You wanted to show me what I was missing.
There she goes.
-Whew! What a day. -Damn it, Jaskier!
translation.ja: なんて日だ お前のせいだ！

translation.en: If life could give me one blessing, it would be to take you off my hands!
translation.ja: 人生に祝福があるなら お前との縁を切ってもらう

translation.en: Right, then.
See you around, Geralt.
You've come for your Child of Surprise.
Princess Cirilla has been raised by Calanthe since her parents died.
translation.ja: シリラ王女は両親の死後 女王に育てられた

translation.en: Pavetta and Duny's ship was lost at sea.
Have you been hiding your head in the sand?
Why do you think she's not safe?
translation.ja: なぜシリラが危険だと？

translation.en: [Geralt] I saw an army. A sea of black and gold.
translation.ja: ニルフガード軍を見た

translation.en: [Calanthe] Why would I give my only heir to someone who never cared enough to come back for her?
translation.ja: 気まぐれに戻った者に 跡継ぎを渡すとでも？

translation.en: Maybe that army won't come, and if they do, maybe you'll be ready.
translation.ja: 軍が攻めて来ても あんたは戦えるだろう

translation.en: But I'm here to protect the girl.
translation.ja: だが俺ならシリラを守れる

translation.en: [Calanthe] Get him out of my sight.
The Nilfgaardian force crossed the Amell Pass.
translation.ja: ニルフガード軍は アメル峠を越えた

translation.en: Should we fall, your granddaughter will rule.
translation.ja: 万が一の時はシリが王位に

translation.en: [Calanthe] They're already here.
-[man 1] Should be here! -[man 2] Find it immediately!
Hello, Yennefer.
[Yennefer] How long do you see yourself here?
Because I may be missing you.
I'm sorry you chose power.
His loss.
-Piss off. -I would, but we don't have much time.
translation.ja: 消えて 時間がないんだ

translation.en: Tissaia asked for me?
translation.ja: ティサイアに頼まれて？

translation.en: She said you're the best student she ever taught.
translation.ja: 最も優秀だと言っていた

translation.en: [Yennefer] Why are you all here?
An emergency conclave of the Northern mages. Nilfgaard took Marnadal.
translation.ja: 緊急会議で招集されたの マルナダルが落ちた

translation.en: [Triss] They're attacking Cintra.
We can stop Nilfgaard, if we act now.
translation.ja: 今すぐ動けば ニルフガードは止められる

translation.en: [Stregobor] Cintra's a lost cause. Let them reap what they sow.
translation.ja: シントラがまいた種は 自分で刈らせる

translation.en: Vilgefortz and I and some others are going to fight. You should join us.
translation.ja: 私とヴィルゲフォルツは戦う あなたも来て

translation.en: The witcher…
If I can bring him here…
-Geralt! -…to Ciri, destiny may yet side with us.
translation.ja: ゲラルト！ そうすれば運命は シリに味方する

translation.en: -[Mousesack] He's gone. -[Lazlo] We must go, Highness.
translation.ja: 見つからない 行かないと

translation.en: Find Geralt of Rivia.
translation.ja: リヴィアのゲラルトを捜して

translation.en: He is your destiny.
Go.
-[Ciri] Why is Nilfgaard here? -[Lazlo grunts]
[Cahir] Do not--
No! No! No!
[man] Princess Cirilla!
[Ciri] You're an elf.
-I'm Dara. -I'm Ciri.
-[soldier] Come on. Get moving! -[yelps]
[Fringilla] We will find her.
She is in Brokilon Forest.
translation.ja: ブロキロンの森にいる

translation.en: [soldier] Armies are not the way into Brokilon Forest.
translation.ja: 軍隊が入れる森じゃない

translation.en: -[Ciri] Mousesack, he helped raise me. -[Mousesack] No!
translation.ja: マウスサックが育ててくれた

translation.en: [sobs] You don't know what she is.
translation.ja: 彼女の正体を知らないだろう

translation.en: [Cahir] Bring me the girl alive.
translation.ja: シリを生け捕りにしろ

translation.en: [Shan-Kayan] What are you, child?
Cintran refugees, dead at least a week.
translation.ja: シントラの民だ 死後１週間は経(た)つ

translation.en: [Geralt] Come on, Roach. Back to Kaer Morhen.
translation.ja: ローチ ケィア･モルヘンに戻るぞ

translation.en: [Yurga] Don't leave!
Fuck.
[Ciri] Mousesack!
[Dara] Something's off about this, Ciri.
My grandmother's sash.
-[Yennefer] We'll save the Continent? -[Triss] There are only 22 of us.
translation.ja: 私たちが大陸の救世主？ こちらは22人よ

translation.en: There's only one way for Nilfgaard to move north, through Sodden Hill.
translation.ja: 敵軍は必ずソドンの丘を通る

translation.en: They're two days away.
[Tissaia] We have sent word to the Northern Kingdoms to join us to defend their lands.
translation.ja: 北方諸国に援軍を要請した

translation.en: -[Yennefer] When is that? -[Vilgefortz] Within two days.
-I've had enough of you. -Mousesack, stop!
-[Dara] If I stay with you any longer… -Kill him.
translation.ja: 君と いたら… 殺して

translation.en: …I'll be dead too.
I can't be there for you anymore.
Nilfgaard's looking for you.
translation.ja: ニルフガードに引き渡す

translation.en: No!
[voices overlapping] The Time of the White Chill and the White Light is nigh.
translation.ja: 白冷と白光が近づいている

translation.en: The Time of Madness -and the Time of Contempt. -[screaming]
translation.ja: 世界は狂気と侮蔑に 満ちるだろう

translation.en: What happened?
[Ciri] They came for me.
[Zola] They got what they deserved.
We're safer when we stick together.
Nilfgaard…
They're here.
[Yurga] Careful, now. You got bit, Butcher.
translation.ja: 安静にしろ　噛(か)まれてる

translation.en: [Sabrina] How is Nilfgaard's army here already?
[Yennefer] They're closing in.
[Vilgefortz] We can't wait for the Northern Kingdoms. We have to fight.
translation.ja: 援軍を待つ時間はない

translation.en: Vilgefortz! Now! [echoing]
They've reached the gate.
-Triss! -[soldiers yelling]
-Shouldn't you be over-- -[Sabrina yells]
Help… me…
Vilgefortz…
How far from your home to the battlefield? To Sodden?
translation.ja: ここからソドンの距離は？

translation.en: -Yennefer, to save these people… -[whimpers]
translation.ja: イェネファー あなたがみんなを救うの

translation.en: …this Continent, let your Chaos explode.
translation.ja: イェネファー あなたがみんなを救うの 心の混沌を爆発させて

translation.en: Yennefer?
Yennefer!
-Yennefer! -[Tissaia] Yennefer!
[Geralt] Yennefer!
People linked by destiny will always find each other.
translation.ja: 人は運命なら出会える

translation.en: Who is Yennefer?
